directions: Combine chicken, soy sauce, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and black pepper in a slow cooker; allow to marinate, 10 to 15 minutes.
Mix tomatoes, carrots, red potatoes, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, and peas into chicken mixture.
Cook on high for 3 to 4 hours (or on Low for 7 to 8 hours).
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into cubes
1/2 cup soy sauce, or to taste
1/2 cup olive oil, or to taste
title: Slow Cooker Chicken Afritad
